title: Best firework displays and events across the UK to celebrate Bonfire Night 2019
text:
There's nothing quite like a fireworks display: the explosion of colour, the whoops and gasps from the crowds. It's why Bonfire Night is always a staple on our winter-time calendars. But, despite the hype, it can be hard to find the best firework displays in your area.

This year, Bonfire Night falls on Tuesday, November 5. As such, a lot of the 2019 firework displays will take place on the preceding Friday or Saturday. There are options on the day itself, too - but, if worse comes to worse, you might want to buy some fireworks and put on a little show in you garden (although you won't be able to buy fireworks from Sainsbury's this year).

Yet home shows just don't compare to big public events,...
